content.detailedDescription: About 8 p.M. my husband look outside on his way to work and pointed out that there was a very bright star that was blinking i told him that it was not a star it was a helicopter at that point it was in far east distance between tree behind power lines.He then said no that is definitely not a helicopter we look for about 5 minutes and then he left and went to work i constantly look out of my back window and about 9 p.M. i looked outside my back door and i noticed that it had gotten closer to where it is somewhat over my neighbor's backyard shed i thought it was very very very odd so i went and grabbed my phone is took a picture i was very curious on why it has moved closer and why it was still blinking the way what as i originally thought it was a helicopter hey maybe it's an airplane but it hasn't really been moving so i took the picture and i blew it up as much as i could and it had this weird weird shape you could see the light. it and the shape that the picture right out as i blew it up what symbols a boomerang but then again you know it could be a different shape because i am only looking at it one engl it is not the first time we meeting in our area above our house has a lot of time we can't really look outside and look at the stars on certain nights and there's a beautiful fighting of stars every now and then we get a few things but this one really stood out and i had to get a picture to get a closer look at it is nine thirty three pm n this object has gotten a little closer than what it was at 9 p.M. so i am constantly is closely watching is such a thing pictures and figure this out.
content.summary: Blinking fast at a distance, very noticeable, then an hour later it got closer

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 7:45 pm, tonight, january 10, 2015 as my husband and i traveled due north up our drive, we both saw a red flash like a flare or tracer flash ahead of us.  it appeared to come from behind the house, cross the road/driveway and shoot up over the field then disappear as a tracer bullet would.  the flash appeared to travel east to west across our road and straight up over the fields to the east then disappeared.  we drove past the house and shined our lights into the fields north of our home.  we turned at the end of our road/drive and shined our lights behind the house to try to identify if someone was in the fields either north or west of the house. the end of the road is approximately 100 yards from the front door.  we parked in front of the house and went inside at approximately 7:48 pm edt.  my husband quickly brought the flash light back outside along with our dog.  at approx. 7:50 pm edt, he witnessed a large light above the sse horizon.  he called for me to come see and i went outside.  the solid orange yellow light was stationary and very bright, lighting up the clouds and horizon.  we watched this for 3-4 minutes.  i ran in for my coat and my husband reached into the truck for his binoculars.  when i returned outside approx. 1 minute later, the bright light was gone and what appeared to be a small craft that appeared to be a helicopter was traveling north from where the light had been.  my husband reported that when he turned back from getting his binoculars, the bright light was gone and a small craft with blinking lights like those of a helicopter was in the same area but traveling east, then eventually turning north.  the skies were mostly clear with very light high altitude cirrus clouds, temp was 5 degrees, and until the light appeared the skies appeared mostly clear with stars very visible in all directions. the object appeared to be cone shaped with a round top and appeared to be completely illuminated.
content.summary: Large yellow orange circular light appreared in the sse, approx. 5 degrees above horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Followed 3 lights in triangle formation as i was driving home.  moving west/southwest toward norwalk.  thought was airplane at first, but formation was strange.  lights moved steadily away.  could barely see it by the time i got home (too far away).  got out binoculars, but couldn't distinguish any details.  wanted to call and report immediately, so spotter in that area could check it out, but no phone number on this site - frustrating!
content.summary: Triangle formation of lights

content.detailedDescription:
i cannot remember the exact date as it was so long ago. i think it was in 
1971 sometime maybe summer as the weather was good,clear and no rain.
 at the time i was living near camberley in surrey. i was just going to bed when i noticed a luminous object about 3 miles away streak up almost vertically at very high speed, perhaps about 2000mph.After it had ascended to
about 3/4 mile it suddenly turned almost at right angles. it became much brighter as it turned and was clearly in the shape of a classic flying saucer with a domed top.It then travelled horizontally, nearly in my direction,but losing speed.It passed within about 1/2 mile of my line of sight.It was about 750yds high when it passed over a house about 500yds
to my side.By then it was travelling at about 600mph.It was oval shaped about the size of an aircraft carrier. i did not see any structural detail and no dome but it may have been moving at an obscure angle to me. it was
luminous,looked metallic and silver in colour.It was opaque with clearly defined edges,not fuzzy. it made no sound and left no trail.It continued in
the same direction which was northerly, perhaps magnetic north.
 i was looking out of a window so i lost sight as it passed my house.
 if it maintained the same direction it would have gone over bracknell, a
large town, a few miles away, so maybe others may have seen this ufo.
 the object did seem to be under intelligent control but i wonder
if it could have been an earthlight? however the fact that it was
of a silver metallic colour with sharply defined edges does not seem
to be consistent.I was lving in the camberley area for about 12 years
and was not aware of any seismic activity.
 there were two other sigtings of strange objects i had before and after
from the same address but not as dramatic. many years later though i
realised that they all travelled in a similar direction which was or close
to magnetic north.
 apart from these sightings i have not seen anything else.
 i will forward details of the other 2 sightings later.
content.summary: I observed a luminous object at night streak up about 3 miles away. it came within 1/2 mile, was flying saucer shaped about size of aircraft carrier.

content.detailedDescription: Upon one evening in early 1973 my sister and i observed a giant x shaped object hover over woods behind our house and move slowly over and behind to the right and down over the trees. the giant x had large glowing circles covering it. we didn't think much about that evening until i remembered it several years later i questions we both suppressed it to this day i remember it like yesterday but my sister has no recollection. there were no beams just glowing halo around the x and the circles on the surface.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One evening while looking at the stars before going to bed my sister shelly and i saw a giant x with round  glowing disks on the side facing us move slowly above the trees behind our house. the object mover slowly behind the trees behind our house.

content.detailedDescription: I was moving my trailer into the dock when i got out of the cab i noticed a white object hovering the flying over my head about twenty or so feet in the air then it was gone.
content.summary: Was standing outside when i noticed it hovering towards me

content.detailedDescription: arrived at home, exited the truck and saw what i thought was a couple helicopters flying in loose formation over the city of bend.  walked towards the house and looked up again to see three objects.  watched them for awhile until i realized there was no rotor noise so they couldn't be helicopters.   i went inside to bring my girlfriend out to see them.  when i returned, the first two were starting to head to the east.  the light seemed to fade until they dissappeared.  this took about 2 1/2 minutes from  the time i saw them till the time they dissappeared. about this time my girlfriend came out, and was able to see the third object glowing brightly.  we watched it until it began to change direction and head east like the first two.  the light stayed bright for another minute or two as it got farther away,then faded. there was never any sound, never any flashing lights.  sky was clear, no wind.   total time observed was 4 minutes.
content.summary: Three lights approached high in the night sky, arced and departed to the east as the lights faded

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside for cigarette, looking up at the moon in south. i turned to east and saw a bright light in eastern sky proceeding from south to north. the light was a bright white ball with a lighter white light in the shape of a boomerang at the nose of the ball. the light proceeded at a good rate of speed, slowed down for a short period, then regained speed again. there are large trees in town so i lost sight of it after about 30 seconds. i went north down the street to see if i could continue to see the light but it was gone. the sky was clear and the stars were out. it is winter so the temp was approx. -25 degrees celcius. no wind. it was quiet and no other aircraft in area. the ball of light did not make a sound. the shape would be if you took a boomerang, turned it so that it was pointing north and the ball of light was behind the pointy part. the ball was bright and the boomerang part was lit but not as bright as the ball. i've seen shooting stars before and this was not that. i don't know what it was but it definitely affected me. i can't seem to get it out of my head. i wasn't nervous or scared during the sighting. i am more intrigued and would like to know what it was. i was hoping that it might turn and come back towards town but once it disappeared i never saw it again.
unfortunately, i did not have my cell phone with me and did not have time to run into the house and get it.
content.summary: Bright light w/ boomerang shaped lighter lite in front

content.detailedDescription: The observed crafts came in low and had like a white aura trailing them. they were silver in color and one of the craft was flying around the others in a semi circle formation. i would say in a 12 to 6 and 6 to 12 flying formation around the other two(2) in a rapid formation.
content.summary: i had just finished talking to a friend on the phone while i was outside.  i looked up and could not believe what i was seeing.  i frantically was looking for witnesses around me.  i spotted  these two kids,  yelled to them

content.detailedDescription: I was facing north on hwy 75, in my semi, about 1 mile north of the emerson mb/pembina nd border crossing.  i was pulled over and was about to get out of my truck to check the tires. i opened my door, stood on the step, i took one step down and suddenly had a strong/strange feeling to look up. i looked up, directly at a strange blue/white object with a curved halo(?). at first i thought it was a very slow moving comet, having never seen a comet before, let alone a slow moving comet, that was just what popped in my head. i stared at it for a few seconds and noticed a second object behind it (roughly 6 inches behind if i held a ruler at arms length). both objects were traveling the exact same speed, on the exact same path. i felt kind of sick in my stomach when i realized that i didn't know what this was. i then jumped back into my truck, went into my sleeper and grabbed my phone to take a video. my phone was on when i grabbed it, i jumped back out and ran to the front passenger side of my truck and somehow in that few seconds my phone shut off! it took about a minute to turn my phone back on and to start the video camera. as i waited for my phone and camera to load, the lead object's "halo" was growing and shrinking and appeared to be swirling. whenever it would make the swirling motion the actual object would black out. i don't mean fade out, i mean it appeared to smear out into a black cloud shape that was darker than the night/early morning sky, then it would "smear" back. my camera finally turned on and i started recording. the video is only 37 seconds long and there is only about 5 seconds of this object. if you are able to lighten the video, or somehow adjust it, you may be able to see more and in better detail. i cannot see the second, smaller, trailing object in the video. the object was very far away at this point, but was still pretty large in the sky, but not big or bright enough to get anymore video. the speed the objects were traveling was approx 1 foot in 5 seconds at a arms length ruler. i don't know if i heard any sound with the objects. i don't remember physically hearing anything, but i had a feeling like i was hearing a noise similar to rustling leaves, but that may have been adreneline,i don't know. i continued watching the object for a few more seconds, but then i had a very strong feeling of being alone and i suddenly felt very frightened and i couldn't get back in my truck fast enough. i jumped in, feeling very panicked and scared, i locked the door, and took off. as stated before, i wish to remain anonymous!
content.summary: Had a sudden urge to look up, saw strange objects, took video on phone

content.detailedDescription: I was just leaving for work, approximately 6:15am on nov 4th,and as i drove along in the neighborhood (ne mesa, az), the object caught my attention.  i'm not sure why i even noticed it, but at first i thought it was a small cloud.  it hit me, though, there was not a cloud in the sky.  maybe it was the contrast of a perfectly clear sky and then this shape.  i watched it the whole drive out of my subdivision trying to figure out what it was.  i don't believe it moved, but i was moving so not sure.  it finally hit me that this might be a ufo, so i took a picture as i was leaving my subdivision.  i didn't think to zoom in before taking it, so it's difficult to see unless you zoom.  it's in the middle of the photo, about 2/3 of the way up.  after taking the picture, i continued onto work, so didn't see what happened to it.  there is nothing that is really spectacular about this sighting, except i can't let it go, i just can't imagine what it could be if not a ufo, hence this report.
content.summary: At first appeared to be a small cloud, but then realized there were no clouds in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I had just picked my daughter up from work in melton and was heading north along melton hwy when my daughter and i both noticed a light zipping across the sky, we watched it as it headed south and then straight up and out of sight. it completely changed direction without any apparent change of speed. the entire event lasted less than 10 seconds.
content.summary: Ufo was heading south at very fast speed then went directly up and out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: High in the sky, thought it was a planet, stationary for a while then began to very slowly descend while taking a slow path in a  more northerly direction. saw only 1.  it took close to an hour for it to hit the treeline.
content.summary: Planet like object slowly decending

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my sofa 10:50 pm watching tv and looked out my large window to the northeast and saw what looked like a fire in the sky at altitude that a hospital helicopter might fly.  i called to my daughter to watch with me.  we agreed to stay inside in case it was a craft on fire.  the object looked like two diamond shapes attached vertically, almost like an 8.  it was shining brightly, some flickering, 4 to 5 small, round red lights or orbs located on the left side of the object.  it was on a path from northeast to south and southwest.  i was very afraid of it.  the emitted light reflected on my neighbor's car. we did not hear a sound.  it moved approx. 5 mph over my house and going over the park.  i could not see a firm structure and the edges were wavy.  it seemed to be columnar.  as it came over our street my daughter and i agreed that we did not know what it was and we both called it a ufo.  we were very shocked and disturbed and sat together for a couple of hours, of all things, we watched ancient aliens on tv.  we did not call 911 or anyone.  i am relieved that it was not a burning, crashing object.  when it was over my property, i went to my south kitchen window and in a moment i could see it.  i could see the bright, fiery, glowing object and could not see the red lights.  it still seemed like a vertical column shape.  my window is small so i lost sight of it. this experience raised my blood pressure, and i keep reminding myself to breathe.  it is almost 4 am cst, and i won't be going to bed.  i am too shocked and if i am honest, too terrified.
content.summary: Daughter and i thought we would see a fiery crash; slow, reflected off neighbor's car, giant flame object with 4-5 red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home.  received call from relative at approximately 10:20 p.M. on 1/8/15.  relative asked if i'd heard what was occurring with an unknown object flying throughout the area.  i hadn't.  relative then stated since shortly after 9:00 p.M. over 143 witnesses had contacted the county sheriff's dept. reporting an unknown object flying very low and making no sound within the surrounding area.  relative then sent me pages from the county sheriff's webpage where i was able to read eyewitness reports and official responses.  

15 to 20 minutes after the call my relative then stated police were reporting object flying low over a main building in town close to where i live. i went to the bathroom window giving me a line of sight view in the direction indicated.  i saw a low, large slow moving object with a single whitish/ blue light in the front and two same color lights in the back (one located on each side of the object).  they were not blinking.  there seemed to be a considerable distance between the two sides at the back and there appeared to be a "raise" at the point where the lights were connected.  the body of the object the lights were adhered to was dark to dark gray.  after about 30 seconds after seeing the object it turned slowly in a sw direction at which point i lost sight of it.  at the time i remember feeling odd about how something of that size was able to move that slowly at such a low altitude without stalling. and although that ended the duration of my sighting the object continued to be sighted and reported throughout the community to the local authorities by phone and police website for another 40 to 45 minutes. 

official responses continued to the ongoing multiple sightings being reported up through approximately 11:20 p.M. at which time the sheriff's department website was closed.  prior to this, county officials stated the local air guard couldn't pick the object up on radar because it was flying at a number of 81.0 and the radar was set at 121.6 to 123.4. further statements by officials included information indicating two jets had been dispatched from a nearby maryland military facility to investigate and that by checking with faa and local military (airguard / regional airports) the object was neither military or civilian.

although my sighting occurred at approximately 10:35 p.M. the first reported sighting occurred at approximately 9 to 9:10 p.M. there were also numerous pictures sent to the website of the object.  although the lights match what i saw the darkened body in at least one of the pictures looks different.  this may be because i saw the object from it's left side and the picture appears to have been taken from below the object. 

the incident was at the time of this writing over 48 hours ago and to my knowledge there has been no further information given to the community regarding it.
content.summary: Single light in front, two lights in back, low altitude flying over town, slow rate of speed, turned sw

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on 195 south coming from the cape cod area .. while in westport dartmouth area going by whites restaraunt .. i saw to my left a flaming object .... looked like a comet of sorts but then burst and descended toward the ground .. it was about a mile away in the fall river area ... i could not help but notice because it was very strange experience for myself ... at first i thought it was a comet and then it burst into flames and i thought was that some sort of space junk ... lol ... i knew it was something that was not typical to be seeing in the sky.... it seemed to of disentegrated into the atmosphere as it was falling from the sky.
content.summary: Driving on 195 south in westport/dartmouth/fall river area and saw flaming obect fall from skill leaving a trail

content.detailedDescription:
After driving home i was getting out of my car in my driveway in front of my house in the southeast section of fort smith, arkansas. it was a little before 7:30 pm in the evening and it was dark outside. the sky was clear.  

as i was getting out of my car i heard a helicopter approaching from the distance.  since i live near the fort smith regional airport i am used to hearing aircraft and did not really think much of it at first.  however, as i was getting ready to walk toward my front door i glanced in the direction of the helicopter and noticed it was following (or escorting) three red lights.  the lights caught my attention because they did not look like anything i had ever seen flying in the area before.  

the three red lights were flying in perfect formation in the shape of an obtuse triangle. each of the three red lights appeared to be accompanied by a single much smaller red light.  the small lights were each directly behind the large light perhaps off slightly to left. the small lights did not become clearly visible until the large lights were much closer to my location. all together, there was a total of six red lights (3 large lights and 3 small lights).  

at first, i thought the lights were attached to a much larger triangle shaped craft.  as the lights passed over my neighborhood a short distance north of my location, i looked to see if i could observe stars through the craft and i could.  therefore, i concluded that the lights were either three small independent craft flying in perfect formation or they were lights attached to a much larger transparent craft equipped with cloaking/stealth technology.  if it was a large cloaked triangle shaped craft it would have been about the size of a navy aircraft carrier or a bit larger.

the lights/craft traveled in a straight line from east to west at a moderate speed at a low altitude.  a helicopter traveled with the lights a short distance behind the last of the three lights a bit to left of the lights.  the helicopter was likely a military helicopter since the local airport is also home to a us air national guard base and the fort chaffee maneuver training center is only several miles from my house.  as the lights/craft passed by i could hear no sound coming from them.  the craft(s)were silent.  the only sound came from the helicopter traveling behind the lights.  

it could have been my imagination, but it seemed as though there was a slight outline of a giant obtuse triangle shaped craft as the lights moved away from my location toward the lights of the city in the west.  the lights definitely moved as if they were attached to a large craft even though i could not see a larger craft directly. i am still unsure whether i saw three small craft or one very large triangle shaped craft equipped with stealth technology.  the lights and the helicopter eventually passed out of my field of vision behind the tree line as they traveled west in the direction of the fort smith regional airport and the air national guard base.  the entire sighting lasted less than two minutes.

i concede that it is possible the lights could have been military drones, but the lights were constant and did not blink like normal aircraft lights.  i grew up in this area and i am used to seeing military aircraft flying around.  i have even seen the stealth bomber fly over my house traveling to the national guard base for the local air show. i know what military air craft look like and how they move.  the lights i observed did not seem to move like normal aircraft.  it is hard to explain, but there was just something different, almost otherworldly about them.  

as the lights moved by my location i experienced the feeling of confusion more than anything else because i did not know what it was i was observing.  it was unlike anything i had ever seen before.  after the lights moved out of view i experienced the feeling of shock that i might have actually seen a real ufo (or three ufos).
content.summary: Three red lights in triangle formation followed by a helicopter moved in a straight line from east to west near my house.

content.detailedDescription:
After driving home i was getting out of my car in my driveway in front of my house in the southeast section of fort smith, arkansas. it was a little before 7:30 pm in the evening and it was dark outside. the sky was clear.  

as i was getting out of my car i heard a helicopter approaching from the distance.  since i live near the fort smith regional airport i am used to hearing aircraft and did not really think much of it at first.  however, as i was getting ready to walk toward my front door i glanced in the direction of the helicopter and noticed it was following (or escorting) three red lights.  the lights caught my attention because they did not look like anything i had ever seen flying in the area before.

as the lights moved by my location i experienced the feeling of confusion more than anything else because i did not know what it was i was observing.  it was unlike anything i had ever seen before.  after the lights moved out of view i experienced the feeling of shock that i might have actually seen a real ufo (or three ufos).

content.detailedDescription:
It took me a while but i decided to share this story against my husband's wishes. please bear with me as i will be telling yall 2 p.O.V mine and my husbands. 
date and times that this event happened, also this happened in the "hood" 
11-26-14 11:45pm - 11-27-14 12:15 am.
 me and my husband went out to the front yard by our trucks to smoke last cigarette and my husband wanted to wait til midnight to wish me happy birthday we didnt bring our phones with us because we weren't planning on taking long, it was around 11:45 pm and we were stargazing then as i was going to pass him lighter he says wtf is that i turn around and see "it" going through the top portion of the tree across the street and hovering about 20 ft. low and  it was going like 2mph over us and into my backyard and house. 
  here is my p.O.V.
in my opinion it had a shape like ouija hand piece with 4 (ports/circles?) and something in the middle of it between the (ports?) "it" was some made of some sort of metal material
i saw this from about 20-25 feet above me so i see the belly of this "thing". the trippy thing about this was it was cloaked or transparent, to me in my opinion "it" had a predators cloak/transparency not totally invisible like you can see some of it but it was kind of blurry like summers heat haze the main color to me was dull black/grey  with some bronzish like color not bright at all it had 4 (ports?) 2 on each side that color was reddish/orangish/yellowish very dim glow to it with a defined black trimming around ports and there was something in the middle of "its' center in between the (ports?) " it" looked like it was made out of 1 sheet of metal there were no panels,rivets,sections,windows,fumes,smell  when i first saw this i couldn't believe my eyes or brain, me and my husband were frozen out of shock all we could do is rotate around. i wanted to run to the middle of street to see if it sees me but i couldn't move than i wanted to throw the lighter at it to see if it makes a sound or see what its reaction was but i was afraid that it would zap me or something.
we saw it go over us and behind my house and yard. my feelings to this was scared,nervous,curious,adrenaline, denial,reality shattered. 
   my husband did not want to be involed with this report so he gave me his p.O.V and his sketch 
    husband's p.O.V
 he was asking for a lighter when he heard some leafs fall across the street that's when he saw "it" creep up in the top portion of the tree it went through the trees top. his description of "it" 
color: flat black/grey,tan,reddish/orange
 my husband says he doesn't know if "it" itself was organic there were no smells or trails/vapors. in his opinion it had a moth like body with wings closed upside down. to him "its" transparency was like bee wing material i guess membraneish.
he felt excited, nervous, shocked. if it wasn't for him hearing the leafs fall i wonder if we would have noticed "it"
 after this happened i had told him to just draw it don't talk i wanted to make sure i wasn't delusional.  he drew his sketch i drew mine. it was so eerie. i knew we had saw something. as we were reflecting back at what happened we notice a lot of weird things.
 first we live in major city, 1 block away from busy street and concrete plant and in the hood there's always some sort of sound, about 10 seconds before this happened there was zero noise. no animal,traffic,environmental noise.
the street light or house lights didn't flicker or dim when this "thing" went over us the street light didn't illuminate "it"
 "it" didn't cast a shadow , it seemed to reflect light. it kind of seemed holographic. "it" was about 20 ft. above us it measurements were about 5-7 ft. long
3-5 ft. wide and 1-3 ft. in height. we went out the next morning to see if anything happened to tree or street or house. nothing happened no broken/bent branches,burnt not 1 trace of anything birds still gather there. we have no idea of were it went after that we don't know if it went through my backyards trees or the houses behind us we just saw it go behind our house and yard.
  that is so freaky was something in there? was there a purpose in being so low and slow? did "it" see us? both of our concept of reality is shattered my husband never once doubted himself of what he saw, im sometimes in denial but i know what i saw its just hard for me to accept what happened and my mind  permanently tattooed the event. how can this be ? will it come back? now i'm constantly looking at the trees and sky  idk if it will return. plz anybody have any info/experience plz share with me? heres our sketches my husband is the better artist.
content.summary: Wtf did me and husband see on my bday that looked like a ouija hand piece or upside down moth

content.detailedDescription: I live near shore of lake ontario and was driving home and about 5 houses away from home saw star-like object way above my house that was moving slowly in a tight circular path. other than the motion it looked like a star. then it zipped across the sky in a bright white cigar shaped light. the object flew in a nike swoosh-like path across my unobstucted view of the sky.Not sure if the object changed shape or looked cigar shaped from the extremely fast flight. it disappeared in a cloud bank and the clouds flashed with white light briefly before it vanished. it headed south toward city, somebody else must have seen this.
content.summary: Star like object hover slowly in circular path then streaked away extremely fast in white cigar shape light then vanished with bright flash

content.detailedDescription: My brother called me and asked me to go out and look to the east over mt. hood so i did and there it was.A stacked opbject with white blue and red lights stationary but it kind of pulsated i watched for about 20 min.My brother lives about 25 miles west of me and he thought i could see it better
content.summary: Got call from friend ask me to go out and see something in the sky to the east

content.detailedDescription: I recorded up to 7 objects in the night sky. i have a video on my cell phone that i recorded 20 minutes worth of the night lights. i witnessed the lights move up, down, side to side. i also saw them disappear back and forth.
content.summary: Night lights in mount p

content.detailedDescription: I have seen multipul ufos and artificial inteligance from the future over the last 2 years and i need to speak 2someone because i don't no what to do. i did not mean to speak to the future but i have and i have effected the past i don't no what to do.I need help and am willing to explain most if not all my contacts and experiences to the right person but briefly ~ 1st experience was change in the past the whole fukin world changed      not humans but are main feature i whent out side my flat and shouted i now your there then i seen space ship over the house for about a secound. 2nd contact am not going into to much detail on hear sorry but less than a week later i get on the train at plymouth and off train at ivy bridge 1 stop from plymouth after hearing a knock on the train roof i look up and see a birds circuling me so i follow them 30 mins later am on dartmore at the bottom of a big hill small mountain the birds fly up the mountain so i walk up thinking am gonna make contact with the future maybe leave this place anyway i get to the top and then a invisible space ship(s) start circuling the mountain and surrounded me in cloud i could hear frisby sound as the spaceship circulated me done this about 3 times over the 18~24 hours i was there the cloud (fog) would last for 30 mins to 1 hour i end leaving the mountain the next morning i get lost on dartmore trying to get back to train station i eventuly see someone and call an ambulance i go to hospital 3rd contact this was my favorite event the next day this invisible object starts changing shape in the clouds whent small then really big and looked like it was prowling the sky trying to scare off over ufo's and draws 2 pictures at incredibul speeds the first picture was heart that just kept getting bigger then 2 hands shaking, this was over deriford hospital where the new car park is. 4th sighting was the scarest i was sat on a field oposit the royal mail depo in plymouth when i look up and see what looked like earth above me then after a couple of seconds it started going up and down above my head i was scared because it was really big and looked like it could squash me when it was going down it could off been a spaceship because off the angle i was looking at it but it looked like a ball off clouds there was also a helicopter not far away i don't think it spotted it as it was facing away from the spaceship at a distance i left after about 40 mins of watching this spaceship i did not no who else to tell i can't even tell my parents because they won't belive me and i can't keep this to my self anymore its been 2 years now with a lot more brief sightings and no release no one to talk to it about. am happy to answer any questions and more detail and i can get dates aswell for the first 4 sightings
content.summary: Favorite event was 3rd contact which was ai from future it drew a heart in the clouds then hands shaking

content.detailedDescription: I came home from work and turned on fox news. it was only on for a few minutes, then it showed an image of capitol hill. i saw the lights right away and noticed the maneuvers were not normal for our aircraft. i recorded it on my dvr, then video taped the tv.
content.summary: I spotted the lights and noticed the movements were not normal

content.detailedDescription:
1.Passenger in the car and driving home to my house. 
2.The triangle shape that was very bright in the sky. 
3. i thought it was an airplane.
4.It was hovering then rotating. changed shape a bit then got brighter the three lights lined up then disappeared.
5.I was in shock yet excited that i had seen what i had seen.
6. the lights just went black and it was gone.
content.summary: There three redish lights in the sky in the shape of triangle then they got brighter formed a straight line then became dim and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and noticed bright object in sky. at first i thought it was a bright star or plane but as i drove west the object looked bigger and brighter. at the stop light i took the picture. when i got home in five minutes the object was still in sky but had moved west towards the sunset. i went inside to get husband to show him but it was gone when we returned outside.
content.summary: Bright object

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at midnight to ring in the new year. the air was still, with high thin clouds, few stars, and a waxing moon surrounded by a moonbow. towards the se, over the airport, near kirtland air force base, i noted 3 lights, small but appearing as dots, bigger than stars, the lowest 15 degrees, the other 2 about twice as high. all were round, glowing reddish orange. did not pay much attention at first as i have often seen planes taking off in that direction in the 17 years living at this address, and could not hear anything due to the noise of fireworks and gunfire.

the largest dot on the left (n of the others) curved in a path over albuquerque like many aircraft do when taking off. but i first noticed the color of the light was not like that of a plane and there were no running or blinking lights as it turned. it grew brighter and then to my amazement, rose straight up and disappeared -- not continuing w as aircraft normally do. the 2 others, which had not moved, simultaneously faded out.

i've lived in nm virtually my whole life and have seen a lot of weird things in the sky, including high weather balloons glowing after sunset, but never anything that i couldn't explain before now.

the entire event only lasted a minute or two, but i spent much more time looking up afterwards in sheer wonder and joy. however, my delight was dashed a week later. last night, i found a fresh scoop mark on my left shin. it was an eighth of an inch in diameter, and about that far immediately to the left of scars left by several others. 

no memories of anything odd accompany these marks, but a wound has often appeared there at various times since i was about 8, and it feels like tissue has been removed at least down to the bone. they take a very long time to heal, much longer than other injuries. i'm sure this latest mark was not present when i showered two days previously, and i don't think it was there when i got up for some reason the night before at 3 am.

i have no memory of banging my leg. and as i am on a blood thinner, even the tiniest scratch bleeds a lot. there were no traces of blood on the leg, my sheets, sock, or the thermal underwear i wear during the day this time of year. i have a strong feeling that its reappearance at this time is not coincidental.

i have included a rendering of my observation of the sky (based on a daylight picture taken this summer), and also a shot of my shin taken just this morning. brightness and contrast have been altered on the latter to make the scars of previous scoops stand out more.

hope this helps. thanks!
content.summary: 3 lights, 2 stationary that faded, third curved over city then rose straight up.

content.detailedDescription: Out walking with another officer, off duty. video is self-explanatory.
content.summary: Startling loud jet noise before breaking over hill

content.detailedDescription: Me and some buddies were sitting in a car waiting for some friends to call us about a party that was going on later that night. there were no drugs and no alcohol consumed before the sighting or during. we started seeing flashing lights that looked almost like lighting and would light up the sky around us for maybe a couple miles. we tried getting a close look but everytime we drove closer the lights would dissapear. finally when we thought the object was gone, we started driving to go downtown and get something to eat. as we started driving in the opposite direction of the lights we realized that the same flashes we appearing in our rear view mirrors and they were getting closer. everytime we would turn in a different direction, the lights seemed to follow us until one of my friends said that they could be trying to make it so we didn't tell anybody what we saw. my friend sped up the car until the lights suddenly flashed in front of the vehicle very brightly cussing us all to yell and close our eyes. we all suddenly started feeling sick to our stomachs and we tried to call a ufo report line. after that we decided to go somewhere busy in town and we ended up sitting in the macdonalds parking lot talking about what had just happened. after about an hour we got a text from our buddy telling us that people were starting to come for a house party. we started driving, thinking the the situation was over and that it would bother us again until we got a bit out of town and suddenly 3 bright orbs appeared, 2 on one side of the vehicle and 1 on the other. they were about the size of a car except in a spherical shape. the pulsates large quantities of energy and bright light, so much so that  our phones all died and the car ignition started whirring in and out of life. the radio started playing static and our headlights started flickering. something tells me the orbs were taking energy from our electronics and putting it into their own power system. we sped up and were about to call 9-1-1 when all of a sudden they made a very loud supersonic boom and moved faster than anything i had ever seen up into the clouds and dissapeared. i'm not too sure what happened that night but regardless i was hoping the people who read through this before they submit it would possibly be able to email me at the address i gave and let me know if this is a common occurrence or if there are any other similar stories like this that i could ask someone or get more info about. thanks for your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Orbs of light with pulsating flashes that killed our batteries and followed our car.

content.detailedDescription:
Solidly lit object that looked similar to a grill of a bwm, wing like. witnessed 2 objects three minutes apart.

while using the new camera and looking into the night sky almost straight up. i saw one image with two luminous trapezium shapes with rounded corners moving slowly from north to south. the craft was about three fingers wide at an arm's length and the length of the craft was half as long as wide. a trapezium shape with quadric corners or rounded corners, one thus and one opposite (two wing shaped craft). it was unique, it was the first time i've ever seen this shapes or associated it with ufology . 

later while reviewing my thoughts, the image i saw reminded me of the chrome grill of a bmw almost or close to the shape, a two trapezium shaped wing image. must look at the grill of a bmw to relate to what i saw. 

the image was self illuminating as if the edge was lit up fluorescently while the area in between was less illuminating. the color was that of a very dim fluorescent bulb with a blue hue. i didn't question the validity of the object. i just knew it was one of a kind and it was physically there in the sky not projected. 

three minutes later, 11:00pm, another craft exactly the same moved north to south across the sky, making 1 or 2 degree correction turn to the east. each pass of the craft lasted about 15 seconds. as it traveled the object got smaller until the distance was too far away to see.   there was no sound associated with the sightings. the fluidity and grace of the traveling crafts sent a rush through my body - wow is all i could think- what an experience. i'm in the salt lake valley's west side about 5600 west. the direction of the craft took them toward the south ends west side witch happenes to be where the nsa is located. the sighting and the nsa location make for interesting speculation of the event. could there be other organizations aware of the sighting event on august 19th 2014 at 10:57 and 11:00pm ? is there photographic evidence from the nsa of the night sky on that dark night ? i would love know if there is a possibility to obtain night sky images from the north to south pass of the objects from the nsa or the salt lake international airport radar. there's more than likely other people that witnessed the event somewere of the unique shape and lumination of the wing looking craft. i've looked everywere for anything similar to the shape and lumination and didn't find anything yet. look at the file and that's the image i came up with,it's one of a kind. 

nothing came out in the pictures, that's because i wasn't experienced with the camera or ready for the event.

twenty minutes later, my son and i were scanning the skies. in about the same location as the 10:57 and 11:00 pm sighting we saw a blinking or solid streaking light that went in 1 or 2 second intervals and that happened 5 or 6 times all in the same area not moving through the sky. the same blink or streak repeating in the same spot in the sky. (no sound) 

the color was that of an incandescent light bulb. the size of the blink or streak was the same as a small meteor. 

it was all worth the skeeter bites we endured. 

we live on the west side of the salt lake city valley in utah.
content.summary: Two craft 10:57 and 11:00pm trapizium shape wings with quadric corners like the grill of a bmw grill three fingers wide and two fingers long at arms lenght cloudless night
